title: BRIEF-Sagon Resources Says Placement Raises $1.25 Million
text:
BRIEF-Sagon Resources Says Placement Raises $1.25 Million

Stock Markets 17 minutes ago (Oct 16, 2019 09:56)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Sagon Resources Says Placement Raises $1.25 Million Oct 16 (Reuters) - Sagon Resources Ltd : * ANNOUNCES PLACEMENT TO AUSTRALIAN INSTITUTIONAL INVESTOR RAISES $1.25 MILLION * ISSUE PRICE OF 6 CENTS PER SHARE FOR PLACEMENT * FUNDS RAISED WILL BE USED TO ADVANCE CUMMINS RANGE RARE EARTHS PROJECT AND FOR GENERAL WORKING CAPITAL

BRIEF-Sagon Resources Says Placement Raises $1.25 Million
description: BRIEF-Sagon Resources Says Placement Raises $1.25 Million
